taskGroup.name: Spatial Allocation (Mapping)
taskGroup.intro:
This set of tasks provide guidance for the specifying a deployment problem in ASSIST.
The spatial allocation describes the mapping of software components to hardware resources. Additional constraints may be defined based on the resource capacities or safety requirements, such as dissimilarity and dislocality. This allocation may not be schedulable.

task.name: Specification of Global Properties
task.intro: The global properties block contains specifications which are used to describe the entire system. This task guides through the specifications which are available the global properties block.

task.name: Specification of Software Components
task.intro: Learn how software components and their resource requirements are specified in ASSIST

task.name: Specification of Hardware Resources
task.intro: Learn how the resource capacities and the topology of the hardware architecture is specified.

task.name: Specifcation of Safety Relations
task.intro: Learn how safety relations between software components are specified within ASSIST.
